name: Fortune Decker
description:
Fortune Decker is a 2D top-down card shooter developed for Indie Spain Jam 2022.

Gotta Get 'Em All!

TEAM:

Daniel Robledo - Code & production. 

Fernando Gueler - Game Design.

Ignacio Polo - Pixel Artist.

Javier Codina - Code, Game Design & Sound.

Javier Moreno - Pixel Artist.

María R. Nadador - Production & UX/UI Design.
